title: Secrets.json Sechema
description: The JSON schema definition for the mandatory 'Secrets.json' file containing confidential data.

Discord.description: A container for all related Discord secret values.

BotToken.description: The bot token for the Discord application (Bot).

Test_Guild_ID.title: Snowflake ID
Test_Guild_ID.description: The server’s snowflake ID; a server that will be used to test the bot and to allow specific development commands for it.

BotDevs.description: An array containing all developers’ IDs of the bot. This will be used to provide some functionalities and special commands.

Roblox.description: A container for all related Roblox secret values.

Cookie.description: The Cookie of the account of which will be used to access certain Roblox APIs. Recomended not to be your main account.

MongoDB.description: A container for all related MongoDB secret values.

URI.description: The connection string excluding the username, password, and database name from it.

Username.description: Your MongoDB user’s name that will provide read and write access for the specified database.

UserPass.description: Your MongoDB user’s password that will provide read and write access for the specified database.

DBName.description: The database to use of your cluster. This is not supposed to be the cluster name.

OpenWeather.description: A container for all related OpenWeather secret values.

API_Key.description:
The API key provided from OpenWeather.
This will be used to retrieve weather and forecast data from OpenWeather’s API.
No paid plan is required.

WeatherGeoCoordinates.title: Longitude and Latitude Values
WeatherGeoCoordinates.description:
Geographical coordinates of the location of which weather will be retrieved. Not a required option;
defaults to Los Angeles coordinates.
